main event: A black object in the sky appeared to be stationary, then moved north and finally dropped after a 15 minute observation. The object looked like two saucers joined together by a span.
interesting points: The object appeared to be stationary at first, then moved west, then north, and appeared to drop.
The object was described as looking like two saucers joined together by a span.
The report concluded that the object was possibly a balloon.
The report mentions a lunar eclipse observation by another ship in the North Pacific on January 19, 1954.
sighted object: a black object in the sky that looked like two saucers joined together
